נערה.text: The letter sequence נערה is the Hebrew word נַעֲרָה, meaning “young women.”

tokensOfLine.text: In halachah, נַעֲרָה can be a technical term for a girl of a specific age. The term קְטַנָּה generally refers to a girl below the age of 12. From 12 to 12.5 years of age, she is called a נַעֲרָה. After 12.5 years, she becomes a בּוֹגֶרֶת, indicating full maturity. These definitions are general and may be contested or inapplicable depending on the given context.
